post.body: I thought as much...I can imagine new mommas eatin that UP!
Ever thought of doing a package for expecting parents?
@sellphone Pretty cool deal! Dont know of anyone who'd need it, but I'll keep it around.
No, but I just got done with a friend's wedding...whatchu need?
I didnt have a choice...the creative team wasn't letting me into my files bc I was on CS3. It HAD to happen... :)
LOL AH! That's hilarious!
That's okay, we'll let you hang out. :) Incidentally, March 6 is the dAY!! I'll check in with you on the 7th
Whoa. That's a lot to deal with. But, how is Peru today?
When you can't decide, print them all. I think that's a rule.
I'm having a hard time believing that Comic Sans is only 13 years old. Feels like 25-30.
Really?wow. Yeah, guess stopped in Oct 03. Makes sense –my last view of one over Parisian skies was Jan. 03. :sigh:
(cont) which incidentally, I think Ilike more. So. Final answer?Set 2. In orange. With Set 1's 3B running a close second.
Mine (FB and Tw) don't want to play together either. I figure it's just a mood and hopefully they'll snap out of it tommorrow.
Ew. I dont know that that means but it sounds...entertaining?
There's nothing quite like one of your fitness/running updates to make me feel like a giant sloth! :)
Interesting. As in, one (singluar) apple-flavored pancake? Or as a NY-style pancake? And what makes a NYpancake different?
UGH you SUCK! I'm at the office down the street choking down a bagel... :)
Thanks! I really enjoyed your video on the Great Wall, by the way....very cool. When Ihave time I'll watch more...
Thanks, I'm quickly becoming convicted that if I survive the rest of 2008, I will be UNTOUCHABLE in 2009!
Well, I'll rest and "peace"as much as Ican – at the office tomorrow! :) Thanks
Nope we just got home. 104.5 temp down to 102 at 5 p.m. and 99.8 at 6:30. We're fine – motrin and amoxicillin on their way
No problem.
LOL. Paint it a nice orangy-putty color. French enough? (my only comparison being hotels and a small Provencal apartment)
We did! We got a quick training from @sellphone. Learned they work really well in Tweetdeck - not so much on Twitter.
You're LIVE. http://www.blackboxmag.com/?p=781
Continually evolving. That's a positive sign, right? (Were you ablt to follow mine and @sellphone's discussion to learn #?)
I just figured it out! The links only show up in Tweetdeck, not in reg. Twitter!!! Eureka!
#twimps?
okay...just tell me one thing....What link?? :)
I figure, if you dont know, ask? I may look like a moron, but I'd be a bigger fool if I was "using" it #wrong!
Peanut Butter Jelly Time http://tinyurl.com/4hcb4f
Hey, have you heard from April yet?
Thank you, darling, for the RT
I was thinking nuclear missle, bazooka, AK47s and a few landmines. :(
Meanwhile I have two kids who sadly, can't be kept calm without Veggietales and Wall-E.
Our Moxi is dead. I can see it's dead. But it'll take 5 days and an inept technician who didn't grad middle school to confirm.
I hate to talk politics, too. So, let's talk weaponry instead. :)
I know. That's pretty much what they think, too. This is why anarchy is so tempting.
between you and the photos that @sdweathers sent in, I'm DYIN ovah here!
Ugh...I would KILLfor a Chinese buffet right now. No, seriously. :heading to the arsenal:
Very cool. Not sure I believe it, but if I was going by the website, I'd sure visit
MMMM....that spread looks GOOD...
Me too. (And I GUARANTEE I'd find a way into that box.)
Yeah I'm off Gibb Shoals. But my neighbor is REALLY 'neck – he pretty much shoots firecrackers every weekend.
Sorry, I couldn't hear you over all the popping and whirring next door! I think my neighbor stocked up for all of 2009!
How about if the government did this with our money?http://bit.ly/pfkI (At least they'd have their grubby mitts off of it!)
There's some cool stuff on there! "Who will run the Internet" "Social Media and the Impact of Us" "Future of e-learning"
Either #magpie stinks or I do. They're not letting me get tweet money.
Jeez, people. REALLY?
Umm...where I come from, pay for play politics is a reason to be FIRED.
WARPED Quote #2: Obama says Blagojevich "should resign."
But only if it's related to THEIR case.
WARPED Quote #1: Black hoped the discovery (of a child's body) was not related to their case.“If it is, it is a sad day,” he said.
Downloading Adobe CS4...yay, yay, happy day!
Watching DVR-ed CSIs, NCIS, and Big Bang Theory. All while working on some copy. Yay. (Unconvincing, you say?) YAY!
And how come Santa looks the same in all of the movies and Mrs. Claus changes in each one???
never saw the Claymation Christmas show with the Miser brothers – mildly amusing!
is packing the kids bags...just in case...
Finally, a diagnosis: Hand Foot & Mouth has found its way to our house. Ponder this: why can't a fully staffed ER figure this out for $300?
Poll: Does your spouse Tweet? If not, do they get sick of your Twitter usage? (photos, 12 sec vids, etc all inclusive!) Tell me ur story...
At work again – looking at another to-do list and a bottle of ibuprofen. (They go together!)
Proof that U.S. still controls world economy – even in SuperPowers. http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/28037960/
Watching the DVRed "The Office." ::fa la la la la, la la, ka-ching!::
Sick child in bed; healthy child in crib; load of dishes in washer; cat given shot; phone messages returned. Who else needs me tonight??
RT @thebrandbuilder: The link between recessions and innovation? http://bit.ly/AwQT (hat tip to @CatalystAdv)
RT @zappos: A great punishment for anyone who hits "reply to all" http://bit.ly/replyall2
Ready for a girls night out!!
#magpie Parents, try Wee Web to share photos, videos, & blurbs about your kids with family and friends, privately. http://rubyurl.com/bb2m
I love how the status on the bottom of my Tweetdeck says "Pretty much ok" Sums it up perfectly. I like a tool that's not overly vague.
I think I need a tutor. Maybe I'll see you @liquiddowntown next week and you can show me... :(
Can someone explain the use of # on Twitter? I feel like Joey on Friends, when he used the "quote" gesture...not sure if I'm doing it right.
Are you in sales? Now hiring reps for the Upstate’s largest Biz Magazine & Interactive platform! 12/23 respond date! http://bit.ly/15SlF
Sales! Now hiring reps for the Upstate’s largest Biz Magazine & Interactive platform! 12/23 respond date! http://bit.ly/15SlF Please RT!!
loving http://www.tizmos.com/ Thanks to @tmmconk for the tip
The absolute best way to get your most vocal, dissatisfied people all talking... nice...
Methinks Charter should read their Customer Service manuals just a few more times. Making enemies with social media fans is a big booboo.
Great. Hubby let kids watch the Avengers and now I have a 3 y.o. "Hulk". Threw all his toys around - now beating up his stuffed elephant.
Wow! Yesterday was big – I got quoted in two different articles! http://bit.ly/CE1C and http://bit.ly/kGhD
Wow, with no TV (Thanks again, Charter) I can't believe how late it's gotten! 'Night all!
A lecture from Oxford, specifically for members of #SMC Greenville. http://bit.ly/tD8l Enjoy, @treypennington!
